title: commercial agricultural land Tangalle
details:
3 km to colombo-hambantota main road
commercial and agricultural land Tangalle,with coconut trees.
famous beautifull Rekawa beach in sri lanka. There is a calm and quiet environment, This land is situated on the Rekawa tourism zone, This land is suitable for tourism hotel project.

clear deeds,
